name: JuicyOrNot
description:
Control

1) W, S, A, D to move.

2) Mouse to click button.

It is just a simple little game, control a bean to pass all obstacles and collect cubes. This game was developed for my dissertation in Glasgow School of Art to evaluate how sound and visual feedback influence game experience.  

I chose to develop a 2D pixel Game just because it is easy for me. I'm good at visual design, so I can draw all the animation by myself to fix requirement. And the most important reason is I'm  not good at coding  T_T! I know a 3D game will be better for this research, but........ Maybe next time, when I'm better --!.
